title: (x) 'Republic' black tech sans - Monark {Alex Broadhurst (self)}
content:
Hello, could anyone identify this font for us? I didn’t screen grab the font name when I first found it and now I can’t think where I typed it! Here’s the link.. [http://furryvision.com/republic.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071020195448/http:/furryvision.com/republic.gif) thanks in advance, Alex

 [‹ (x) Communist engraving on stone wall - (similar to) Baby Teeth {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071020195448/http:/typophile.com/node/36049 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Roadservices" Dead History look-alike {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071020195448/http:/typophile.com/node/36047 "Go to next forum topic")
author: furryvision

comments.content: I wish I knew what this font was, because that R is boss. Quick someone ID this!
Found it, is Monark Black from T26, sorry...!
I love that R, but the rest of the characters seem pretty stiff and sterile.
